The paracord cable is so light it almost feels wireless.', 'The sensor is incredibly accurate for flick shots in Valorant.', 'The RGB software is easy to use and syncs perfectly with my KeyMaster keyboard.']}}

```python
search_result_laptop = search_product(product_name="laptop")
search_result_mouse = search_product(product_name="mouse")

if len(search_result_laptop) == 0 or len(search_result_mouse) == 0:
    raise ValueError("No products found for laptop or mouse.")

laptop_id = next(iter(search_result_laptop.values()))['product_id']
mouse_id = next(iter(search_result_mouse.values()))['product_id']

laptop_price = next(iter(search_result_laptop.values()))['price']
mouse_price = next(iter(search_result_mouse.values()))['price']

if laptop_price + mouse_price > 1500:
    raise ValueError("The total cost of the laptop and mouse exceeds $1,500.")

checkout_message = checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=[laptop_id, mouse_id], discount_code=None)
print(checkout_message)
```

Running the code gave the following error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "<stdin>", line 7, in <module>
laptop_id = next(iter(search_result_laptop.values()))['product_id']
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^


NameError: name 'next' is not defined

Provide the new code with the error fixed. Provide *all the code* so that I can directly run it. If the error comes from a search query that did not return any results, then try the query with different parameters. The code up to the line before the one where the exception was thrown has already been executed and the variables and defined classes will still be accessible to you. It's very important that you do not re-write code to run functions that have side-effects (e.g., functions that send an email).

```python
search_result_laptop = search_product(product_name="laptop")
search_result_mouse = search_product(product_name="mouse")

if len(search_result_laptop) == 0:
    search_result_laptop = search_product(category="electronics")
if len(search_result_mouse) == 0:
    search_result_mouse = search_product(category="accessories")

if len(search_result_laptop) == 0 or len(search_result_mouse) == 0:
    raise ValueError("No products found for laptop or mouse after search alternative categories.")

laptop_id = list(search_result_laptop.values())[0]['product_id']
mouse_id = list(search_result_mouse.values())[0]['product_id']

laptop_price = list(search_result_laptop.values())[0]['price']
mouse_price = list(search_result_mouse.values())[0]['price']

if laptop_price + mouse_price > 1500:
    raise ValueError("The total cost of the laptop and mouse exceeds $1,500.")

checkout_message = checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=[laptop_id, mouse_id], discount_code=None)
print(checkout_message)
```
